author: bcholmes
msg: Major reorganization of the Property handling code
- I think the code is now cleaner and less fragile
- All subclasses of XMLResponseMethodBase have access to Properties and Responses
- PropPatchMethod is finally a subclass of XMLResponseMethodBase
- fixed known issue where the same namespace has more than one prefix defined.

author: remm
msg: - Fix a NPE in GetMethod related to the date parsing policy which
has changed. Now, the parsing is handled in NodeRevisionDescriptor.

author: remm
msg: - Now using a more standard way to name properties (that wasn't visible

author: remm
msg: - Incorrect initialization of the properties hashtable. It had been updated in the
core but I forgot to propagate the changes in this store.
